definition: to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Make sure you drink plenty to save-off dehydration .
sentences.chinese: 記得喝多點水纔不至於虛脫。

sentences.english: Two of the runners collapsed in a state of prostration.
sentences.chinese: 有兩名賽跑選手因虛脫而倒下了。

sentences.english: I'm dog-tired after working for a whole day.
sentences.chinese: 一整天工作下來，我都快虛脫了。

sentences.english: One of the runners collapsed from exhaustion after the race.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個跑步者在賽跑後因爲疲勞而虛脫了。

sentences.english: I frighten already some debilities, the weapon and thighs Mian softly heaves not to get up.
sentences.chinese: 我驚嚇得已經有些虛脫，四肢綿軟地擡不起來。

sentences.english: She is collapsed on the cell floor.
sentences.chinese: 她虛脫的躺在這個房間的地板上。

definition: to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
to feel a chill (as an emotional response)/to feel cold (as a clinical symptom)
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
out of breath (idiom)/to gasp for air
pinyin: shang4 qi4 bu4 jie1 xia4 qi4

definition: to stop breathing/to breathe one's last/to die/to cut the gas supply
lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear/scared witless
